Interface ViewList

All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewManager
public interface ViewList
Interface representing a list of AbstractViews, providing methods to manage and interact with the views it contains.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    closeView(AbstractView view)
    Closes the specified view by removing it from the current view list or interface.
    void
    moveViewLocation(AbstractView view, int x, int y)
    Moves the specified view to a new location by the increment defined by x and y.
    void
    openView(AbstractView view)
    Opens the specified view by integrating it into the current view list or interface.
    void
    substituteView(AbstractView oldView, AbstractView newView)
    Replaces an existing view with a new view in the view list.

  • Method Details

    • openView

      void openView(AbstractView view)
      Opens the specified view by integrating it into the current view list or interface.
      Parameters:
      view - The AbstractView instance to be opened.

    • closeView

      void closeView(AbstractView view)
      Closes the specified view by removing it from the current view list or interface.
      Parameters:
      view - The AbstractView instance to be closed.

    • substituteView

      void substituteView(AbstractView oldView, AbstractView newView)
      Replaces an existing view with a new view in the view list.
      Parameters:
      oldView - The existing AbstractView instance that is to be replaced.
      newView - The new AbstractView instance that will replace the old view.

    • moveViewLocation

      void moveViewLocation(AbstractView view, int x, int y)
      Moves the specified view to a new location by the increment defined by x and y.
      Parameters:
      view - The AbstractView instance to move.
      x - horizontal increment.
      y - verical increment.
